news_header: US TikTok users are migrating to a Chinese app called RedNote as a potential ban looms.
news_text: As the threat of a TikTok ban in the US approaches, users are flocking to a Chinese app named RedNote, which has become the most downloaded app on the Apple US App Store. Known as 'TikTok refugees', these users are drawn to RedNote's lifestyle sharing features, similar to TikTok and Instagram, and the app has gained about 300 million monthly users. Despite concerns about censorship and security, many users express excitement about the new platform, with some even embracing the term 'Chinese spies' in a humorous context. Users report a welcoming community and a desire to explore Chinese culture through the app.
